2025-07-15.name: Riverside Walk
2025-07-15.description: A gentle 60-minute walk along the riverside with local vendors and photo spots.

2025-07-15.name: City Museum
2025-07-15.description: Indoor museum showcasing local history and contemporary exhibitions.

2025-07-15.name: Welcome Food Stalls
2025-07-15.description: Sampling stall-style local specialties for a casual dinner.

2025-07-16.name: Guided Kayak
2025-07-16.description: 2-hour guided kayaking on calm waters; includes life jackets and basic instruction.

2025-07-16.name: Local Food Market Tour
2025-07-16.description: Walk-through of a buzzing market with tasting stops and vendor stories.

2025-07-16.name: Indoor Cooking Class
2025-07-16.description: Hands-on 2.5-hour local cuisine class suitable for all skill levels.

2025-07-17.name: Sunrise Lookout Hike
2025-07-17.description: Moderate hike to a viewpoint; great for sunrise photography (bring water and sun protection).

2025-07-17.name: Contemporary Art Gallery
2025-07-17.description: Small but curated indoor gallery featuring local artists.

2025-07-17.name: Harbor Boat Cruise
2025-07-17.description: 90-minute coastal cruise with narration and optional refreshments.
